name: Attachment of salary, etc.
text:
The salary, stipend, or wages of the beneficiary may be attached for, and applied in the payment of the beneficiary's debts, in the manner prescribed in this chapter. [L 1890, c 50, §2; am L 1921, c 66, §1; RL 1925, §2847; RL 1935, §4293; RL 1945, §10322; RL 1955, §238-2; HRS ; gen ch 1985]
 
Case Notes
 
Prior law.
  Not in conflict with §§25 or 55, Organic Act; Salary of senator garnishable.  19 H. 428.
  Salary of legislator not subject to garnishment when payable out of federal funds to be disbursed by authorized federal agent.  31 H. 1014, 1016.
